sentence.Network_en: The main building was also used for the enactment of mystery plays.
sentence.Network_cn: 主楼还用于神秘剧的演出。

sentence.Network_en: It was a re-enactment of the same mental construct under which slavery was justified.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是为奴隶制辩护的同一思想观念的再现。

sentence.Network_en: Two notable regulatory changes resulted from enactment of Pub. L . 96 - 295.
sentence.Network_cn: 在颁布的《公法》96—295条中,有两项改动引起人们的注意.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 王玉梅托福词汇 Word_list_15_在线英语听力室 ... vacant 使成为空，倒空 enactment 设定，制定 encase 装入，包住，围.
...“成人”、“成年人”(adult)* 指年满18岁的人；(由1990年第32号第6条修订)“成文法则”(enactment) 的涵义与条例的涵义相同； (由1998年第26号第4条增补)“成年”(full age)* 指年满18岁； (由1990年第32号第6条增补).

list.abs: 角色扮演学说（Role Enactment）是由萨宾提出并详细阐述的，不过，其最好的解说则见于萨宾是以一个社会心理学家的观点研究催 …
1. 动作表征方式enactive representation 动作表象enactive representation stage 动作表象阶段
national life 国民生计enacting legislation 立法remaining open land 尚未开发的土地
1. 法律制定的enacting classe 制定条款enactment 设定

entry.def: The enactment of a law is the process in a parliament or other law-making body by which the law is agreed upon and made official.

example.ex: We support the call for the enactment of a Bill of Rights.
example.tran: 我们支持要求通过《权利法案》的呼声。

entry.def: The enactment of a play or story is the performance of it by an actor or group of actors.

example.ex: The main building was also used for the enactment of mystery plays.
example.tran: 主楼还用于神秘剧的演出。

means.word_mean: 1. the passing of a law by a legislative body
2. a legal document codifying the result of deliberations of a committee or society or legislative body
3. acting the part of a character on stage; dramaticially representing the character by speech and action and gesture

auth_sentence.content: Dances of re-enactment and fireside singing evolved soon after.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dances of re-enactment and fireside singing evolved soon after.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: For most, re-enactment is their full-time job and career.

auth_sentence.content: It is history made memory by re-enactment.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is history made memory by re-enactment.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"具体物"; 2. 表名词,"行为或结果等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: allure吸引+ment具体物→n.诱惑物
embank筑堤+ment具体物→n.堤防,筑堤
equip装备+ment具体物→n.设备,器材,装置;才能
gar装饰3+ment表名词→装饰的东西,衣服
nourish提供养分+ment具体物→n.食物,营养品
oint=oil油+ment具体物→n.油膏,软膏
pave铺路+ment具体物→n.人行道
seg切,割+ment具体物→n.段,片,节,部分
achieve完成,达到+ment行为或结果等→n.成就,功绩
argu+ment行为或结果等→n.争论,辩论,论据
command命令+ment行为或结果等→n.戒律

stems_affixes.value_cn: 意见不同,不调和,争执,不和,争论
stems_affixes.word_buile: disagree有分歧;不一致+ment行为或结果等→n.意见不同,不调和,争执,不和,争论
embezzle盗用+ment行为或结果等→n.贪污,侵吞
embody体现+ment行为或结果等→embodiment
enact实施,颁布+ment行为或结果等→n.设定,制定

stems_affixes.value_cn: 建立,设立,建立的机构[或组织]
stems_affixes.word_buile: establish建立+ment行为或结果等→n.建立,设立,建立的机构[或组织]
fulfill完成+ment行为或结果等→n.完成,履行
govern统治,支配+ment行为或结果等→n.政府
harass烦恼+ment行为或结果等→n.骚扰,扰乱;烦恼,烦乱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 经营,管理;处理,操纵;管理部门
stems_affixes.word_buile: manage管理+ment行为或结果等→n.经营,管理;处理,操纵;管理部门
measure测量+ment行为或结果等→n.测量法,度量
move移动+ment行为或结果等→n.运动,活动;移动,迁移
pay支付+ment行为或结果等→n.付款,支付,报酬
pre预先+dica命令+ment行为或结果等→预先命令做→进入困境
refine精炼,精制+ment行为或结果等→n.精致,文雅,精巧

stems_affixes.value_cn: 点心,饮料,精力恢复,爽快

commence开始+ment行为或结果等→开始→毕业典礼[开始新的旅程]
